statement: An algorithm is just a set of steps to solve a problem.
That means that even the simplest equation is an algorithm!
There are, of course, many ways to solve a probem. However, which method will be the most efficient? What is the fastest? What uses the least amount of memory?
The algorithm you choose could mean the different of your program running in milliseconds to running in hours, even.
IRL, that could mean the difference of millions of dollars if your program can't handle its workload.
